title: Cloudflare R2: Revolutionizing Data Storage
body: Seamless migration ✅ Robust free tier ✅ Egress fees? None! ✅ Dive into the future of data storage with Cloudflare R2. Thousands have already made the switch.

id: Global Navigation Research: Recruiting Screener Survey
title: Help us improve the Cloudflare user experience
body: Are you interested in participating in research studies to help us improve the Cloudflare user experience?
